Package Controller

Class ParticipantController

java.lang.Object
Controller.ParticipantController
public class ParticipantController extends Object
Controls interactions related to participants in a project.

    • hasParticipants

      public boolean hasParticipants()
      Checks if this ParticipantController instance has a participant map and has any mapped participants.
      Returns:
      true if the participant map exists or has any participants; false otherwise.

      public static String getRoleType(int index)
      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index > the size of roleTypes.

      Returns:
      this EntityManager instance.

    • assignPerson

      public void assignPerson(String role, Person person)
      Assigns a Person to a role in the currently selected project.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to which person should be assigned.
      person - the person to be assigned.

    • setParticipants

      public void setParticipants(ResultSet results) throws SQLException
      Gets the list of participants from results and stores it as a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      results - a set of results containing the details for all participants.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a Database communication occurs.

    • getMissingRoles

      public List<String> getMissingRoles()
      Finds all roles in roleTypes which are not in participants.
      Returns:
      roleTypes with the participants keys removed.
